Class PaymentMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Menu
      • PaymentMenu

  • public class PaymentMenu
extends Menu
    Payment Menu which allows the staff to update and print the payment rates and total price.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Li Jin Quan, Lee Jian Hao, Chen Xing Yu, Kok Jia Hui

      This method finds the difference between the startDate and the endDate date to get the number of weekdays and weekends.
      static void paymentMenu(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList, java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList, java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList, java.util.ArrayList<RoomService> serviceList, java.util.ArrayList<Payment> paymentList)
      This method directs the user to the Payment Menu based on the user inputs.

      This method sums up the total bill invoice which is calculated based on the details obtained from roomList, paymentList and serviceList.

    • Method Detail

      • paymentMenu

        public static void paymentMenu(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList,
                               java.util.ArrayList<RoomService> serviceList,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Payment> paymentList)
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method directs the user to the Payment Menu based on the user inputs.
        Parameters:
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details in the system.
        serviceList - This list contains the details of all the room services ordered in the system.
        paymentList - This list contains the hotel rates.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • printPaymentMenu

        public static void printPaymentMenu()
        This method print the payment menu to inform the users of the options.

      • updatePaymentRates

        public static void updatePaymentRates(java.util.ArrayList<Payment> paymentList)
        This method updates the payment rates of the hotel that is stored in paymentList.
        Parameters:
        paymentList - This list contains the hotel rates.

      • printRates

        public static void printRates(java.util.ArrayList<Payment> paymentList)
        This method prints out the payment rates of the hotel stored in paymentList.
        Parameters:
        paymentList - This list contains the hotel rates.

      • printInvoice

        public static void printInvoice(java.util.ArrayList<Payment> paymentList,
                                java.util.ArrayList<RoomService> serviceList,
                                java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                int roomIndex)
        This method sums up the total bill invoice which is calculated based on the details obtained from roomList, paymentList and serviceList.
        Parameters:
        paymentList - This list contains the hotel rates.
        serviceList - This list contains all the room services ordered.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the hotel.
        roomIndex - This index contains the ID of the room that is checking out.

      • getWorkingDaysBetweenTwoDates

        public static int[] getWorkingDaysBetweenTwoDates(java.util.Date startDate,
                                                  java.util.Date endDate)
        This method finds the difference between the startDate and the endDate date to get the number of weekdays and weekends.
        Parameters:
        startDate - The starting date of an event.
        endDate - The ending date of an event.
        Returns:
        An Integer Array of size 2, which contains the number of weekdays and weekends.
